title: Cyber Imposter: AI Among US
description: Cyber Imposter: AI Among Us is a multiplayer strategy game that emphasizes teamwork, strategy, and deception in an advanced technological world. Players take on roles to uncover imposters or sabotage the team, with AI-driven gameplay featuring AI-controlled NPCs and a unique human-AI interaction mode. Tasks, clues, and interactions are powered by cutting-edge AI, creating a dynamic, immersive experience in a futuristic setting.
